segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number.
DTM, A segment to indicate a date and time applying to the whole message, such as: - document or message date and or time
NAD, A segment to identify a party's name, address, and function, such as: - message recipient - message sender

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a reference (and its related date and or time) which applies to the whole message.

segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference, such as: - reference to previous message
DTM, A segment to indicate a date and or time related to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to provide details of the main carriage transport, including related locations and date and times.

segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to specify transport details for the main carriage, such as: - discharge voyage number - radio call sign of the vessel - nationality of the vessel
LOC, A segment to specify either the place of departure or the place of arrival for the main carriage.
DTM, A segment to specify a date and or time related to the main carriage transport, such as: - estimated date/time of departure - estimated date/time of arrival
RFF, A segment to specify a reference related to the transport details, such as: - loading voyage number (if different from the voyage number assigned by the carrier or his agent in the TDT-segment).
FTX, A segment to specify supplementary information related to the main carriage transport.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify a tank or deadweight item by its place on or in the means of transport.

segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify the location of a tank or deadweight item on the means of transport, such as: - fore peak tank
MEA, A segment to provide a measurement related to the tank or deadweight item, such as: - gross weight of tank contents - volume of liquid in the tank - specific gravity - percentage full

DIM, A segment to specify dimensions of the deadweight item, such as: - length expressed in 'longitudinal centre of gravity' - width expressed in 'transverse centre of gravity (from centerline)' - height expressed in 'vertical centre of gravity (from keel)'
FTX, A segment to describe the actual contents of tanks, such as lubricating oil, marine fuel oil, fresh water.
